text: Ndipo Mulungu adzati: “Ili ndilo tsiku limene chilungamo chawo chidzawapindulira anthu olungama.” Iwo adzakhala nthawi zonse m’minda yothiriridwa ndi mitsinje yamadzi yoyenda pansi pake. Iwo adzakhalamo mpaka kalekale. Mulungu ndi osangalala ndi iwo ndipo iwo ndi Iye. Kumeneku ndiko kupambana kwakukulu
